text: Leslie Charles Lobb (5 September 1894 – 3 March 1970) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Les Lobb's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1894 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Les Lobb
